titles.title: Be Open Act
To repeal a requirement that new employees of certain employers be automatically enrolled in the employer's health benefits plan.
Be Open Act
Better Enrollment Options Protect Employee Needs Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Better Enrollment Options Protect Employee Needs Act or the Be Open Act
This bill amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to repeal the requirement that employers with more than 200 full-time employees that offer enrollment in one or more health benefits plans automatically enroll all new full-time employees in one of those plans.
